channel.title: CVE Feed for Jegstudio -- Gutenverse
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jegstudio -- Gutenverse

item.title: CVE-2024-38785|2024-08-02T04:19:20.229Z -- jegstudio -- gutenverse
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jegstudio Gutenverse allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gutenverse: from n/a through 1.9.2.
